Still, his barbs stop short of ad hominem attacks, and the memoir, even with its flashes of lingering resentment, maintains a measured tone. Wishes Bush Had Let Him Go Earlier In the book, Donald Rumsfeld explains that on two separate occasions after the story of Iraqi detainee abuse at Abu Ghraib broke out, he offered his resignation to the president.
